Package nusri.fyp.demo.service

Class ConfigService

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.service.ConfigService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
@Service public class ConfigService extends Object implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Service class responsible for managing configuration settings in the application.

This class performs the following functions:
  • Startup Loading: Loads the most recent configuration from the database at application startup (see afterPropertiesSet()). If none is found, applies default values specified in Config.defaultValue().
  • Persistence: When configuration changes are made, they are serialized and stored in the database via updateConfig().
  • Default Values: Fields annotated with Config will use the specified default value if no saved configuration is available (see useDefaults()).
  • Quota Configurations: Manages quota settings for different presets through getQuotaConfig(String) and addQuotaConfig(String, QuotaConfig).
  • Model Mappings: Tracks a mapping of preset names to model descriptors, e.g. { "default": "roboflow@tomcai@detect-count-and-visualize-2" }, accessed with getUseModel(String).

Configuration data is persisted in the database as JSON via ObjectMapper. Each field annotated with Config will be included in the serialized configuration map (see serializeConfig() and loadConfig(Object, String)).

Usage:
Typically, other services or controllers call methods like getUseModel(String) to retrieve model configurations for a given preset, or getQuotaConfig(String) to get timeouts/limits, etc. Administrators may update these configurations at runtime, triggering a new database entry.
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigService

      public ConfigService(ConfigChangeLogRepository configChangeLogRepository, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, PresetRepository presetRepository, PythonServerRepository pythonServerRepository, RoboflowWorkflowRepository roboflowWorkflowRepository)
      Constructs a ConfigService with all necessary repositories and the JSON object mapper.
      Parameters:
      configChangeLogRepository - the repository for storing configuration change logs
      objectMapper - the JSON mapper for serializing config fields
      presetRepository - the repository for managing presets
      pythonServerRepository - the repository for Python server info
      roboflowWorkflowRepository - the repository for Roboflow workflow info

  • Method Details

    • afterPropertiesSet

      public void afterPropertiesSet() throws Exception
      Initializes the service by loading the latest configuration from the database.
      If no valid saved configuration is found, applies defaults via useDefaults().
      Specified by:
      afterPropertiesSet in interface org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
      Throws:
      Exception - if loading or parsing configuration fails

    • updateConfig

      public void updateConfig() throws Exception
      Persists the current configuration by serializing annotated fields to JSON and saving them in a ConfigChangeLog record.
      Throws:
      Exception - if serialization or database write operations fail

    • serializeConfig

      public String serializeConfig() throws Exception
      Serializes all fields annotated with Config into a JSON string.
      Reflection is used to identify annotated fields.
      Returns:
      a JSON string representing all current configuration values
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during serialization

    • loadConfig

      public void loadConfig(Object bean, String json) throws Exception
      Loads configuration values from a JSON string into the given object's annotated fields.
      This allows partial updates where only some fields are overwritten if present in the JSON.
      Parameters:
      bean - the object to apply the configuration to (usually this)
      json - the JSON string containing configuration key-value pairs
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error parsing or setting fields

    • useDefaults

      public void useDefaults() throws Exception
      Applies default values to any annotated fields that are currently null.
      The defaults come from Config.defaultValue().
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs reading or setting default values

    • getUseModel

      public String getUseModel(String presetName)
      Retrieves the model identifier (e.g., "roboflow@tomcai@detect-count-and-visualize-2") for the specified preset.
      If no explicit mapping is found, returns the default model descriptor.
      Parameters:
      presetName - the name of the preset
      Returns:
      the model descriptor for the preset

    • getAllLegalModel

      @Cacheable("getAllLegalModel") public List<String> getAllLegalModel()
      Retrieves a list of all available model descriptors (for both Python servers and Roboflow workflows).
      This method is cacheable to improve performance.
      Returns:
      a list of String describing each model (e.g., "python@http://localhost@5000", "roboflow@tomcai@detect-count-and-visualize-2")

    • getQuotaConfig

      @Cacheable(value="presetConfigCache", key="#presetName") public QuotaConfig getQuotaConfig(String presetName)
      Retrieves a QuotaConfig for the specified preset, either from modelQuotaConfig (cached) or by constructing it from the preset information in the database.
      Results are cached in "presetConfigCache" to avoid repetitive lookups.
      Parameters:
      presetName - the name of the preset
      Returns:
      the corresponding QuotaConfig

    • addQuotaConfig

      public void addQuotaConfig(String presetName, QuotaConfig quotaConfig) throws Exception
      Adds or updates the QuotaConfig for a given preset name and immediately saves the updated configuration to the database via updateConfig().
      Parameters:
      presetName - the name of the preset to modify
      quotaConfig - the new quota configuration
      Throws:
      Exception - if serialization or database write fails

    • getAllQuotaConfig

      public Map<String,QuotaConfig> getAllQuotaConfig()
      Retrieve all quota configs that has been changed by the frontend.
      Returns:
      All quota configs.
